nodes.text: The Clabburn Tundra was a stretch of frozen wasteland on the ice planet of Hoth. The area became a battleground between the Galactic Republic, Sith Empire, and scavenging pirate groups during the Cold War. The Clabburn Tundra was also the site of Gargath's Watch, a stretch of tundra patrolled by the massive Kintan crusher Gargath.
